SELECT A.THROUGHPUT_NO, A.LAUNDRY_QUOTA, A.TOTAL_THROUGHPUT, A.OVERSHOOT, A.AREA, A.LDATE, A.BRANCH_CODE, ROUND(A.TOTAL_THROUGHPUT/A.LAUNDRY_QUOTA*100) as quotaPercent, B.BRANCH_NAME as branchName, D.NAME AS name from TB_LAUNDRY_THROUGHPUT A, TB_BRANCH B, TB_EMPLOYEES C, TB_MEMBER D, TB_COM_CODE E where A.BRANCH_CODE=B.BRANCH_CODE AND C.POSITION = E.COM_CODE AND E.COM_CODE_NM='지점장' AND B.BRANCH_CODE=C.BRANCH_CODE AND C.MEMBERNO=D.MEMBERNO and TO_CHAR(A.LDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')
order by A.LDATE desc

SELECT COUNT(A.THROUGHPUT_NO) from TB_LAUNDRY_THROUGHPUT A, TB_BRANCH B, TB_EMPLOYEES C, TB_MEMBER D, TB_COM_CODE E where A.BRANCH_CODE=B.BRANCH_CODE AND C.POSITION = E.COM_CODE AND E.COM_CODE_NM='지점장' AND B.BRANCH_CODE=C.BRANCH_CODE AND C.MEMBERNO=D.MEMBERNO and TO_CHAR(A.LDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')=TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY/MM/DD')
order by A.LDATE desc

SELECT A.THROUGHPUT_NO, A.LAUNDRY_QUOTA, A.TOTAL_THROUGHPUT, A.OVERSHOOT, A.AREA, A.LDATE, A.BRANCH_CODE, ROUND(A.TOTAL_THROUGHPUT/A.LAUNDRY_QUOTA*100) as quotaPercent, B.BRANCH_NAME as branchName from TB_LAUNDRY_THROUGHPUT A, TB_BRANCH B where A.BRANCH_CODE=B.BRANCH_CODE and A.THROUGHPUT_NO=#{throughputNo}

SELECT A.BRANCH_NAME as branchName, A.BRANCH_CODE as branchCode, A.BRANCH_CONTACT as branchContact, A.TOPAREA as topareaCode, A.AREA as area, A.ADD1 as add1, A.ADD2 as add2, C.NAME as name, C.PHONE as phone, C.EMAIL as email, A.ADD1 || ' ' || A.ADD2 as addr, A.BRANCH_LNDRPCRYMSLMCOQY AS branchLndrpcrymslmcoqy from TB_BRANCH A, TB_EMPLOYEES B, TB_MEMBER C, TB_COM_CODE D WHERE B.POSITION = D.COM_CODE AND D.COM_CODE_NM='지점장' and C.ID=B.EMPLOYEE_ID AND A.BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode} AND A.BRANCH_CODE=B.BRANCH_CODE AND B.MEMBERNO=C.MEMBERNO
select * from TB_LAUNDRY_THROUGHPUT where BRANCH_CODE=#{branchCode} order by LDATE desc
select * from TB_LAUNDRY_THROUGHPUT where LDATE=#{date} order by LDATE desc
SELECT * FROM TB_LAUNDRY_THROUGHPUT WHERE BRANCH_CODE=#{branchCode} AND TO_CHAR(LDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN to_char(#{date}-6,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_CHAR(#{date},'YYYY-MM-DD') order by LDATE ASC
